project.title: StreamVibe
project.description: Your gateway to trending movies and TV shows. A modern, responsive web app built with React (and TMDB API) that lets users explore trending, top-rated, and upcoming movies and series. Features include real-time data fetching, search functionality, and a clean user interface designed for smooth navigation and discovery.

project.title: Photography Portfolio
project.description: A stunning portfolio template for modern photographers, Snapfolio is a clean, responsive portfolio website designed to showcase photography work in an elegant and visually captivating layout. It includes smooth image galleries, fullscreen previews, and a minimal UI that puts the focus on the visuals. Perfect for freelancers, professional photographers, or visual artists looking to make a lasting impression.

project.title: ShopEase Landing Page
project.description: A sleek, modern landing page for online stores. ShopEase is a fully responsive e-commerce landing page crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Designed to highlight products effectively with clean layouts, engaging call-to-actions, and smooth animations. Ideal for startups or brands looking to showcase their products and drive conversions.

description.header: I'm a front-end developer based in Prishtina, passionate about building intuitive and accessible web experiences.
description.body: My journey into development began with a focused course, where I quickly gained a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and for a framework I studied ReactJS. Since then, I've deepened my skills through extensive self-study and hands-on coding, culminating in a portfolio that showcases my capabilities. My projects include a news website demonstrating API integration, a dynamic movie blog with search and filtering functionalities, and an e-commerce site powered by Strapi headless CMS and Stripe payment integration. I'm constantly eager to learn more and tackle new challenges in the front-end space.
